name: MyTweetHub
description: Java, Twitter REST API, Twitter4j, JMapViewer, BeautyEye Library - This application is a part of a third year project which consisted of integration of the Twitter REST API using Twitter4j Library. Features consisted of a graphical user interface of OAuth 2.0 with basic Twitter functionality. Using the JMapViewer library, a map visualisation can be used to visualise Tweets in a specific location with an algorithm for displaying the relationships between each response from a Tweet source ID.
